value.title: Olympics-Former Australia chef de mission doubts Tokyo can go ahead

value.title: I.O.C.’s Reassurance About the Tokyo Olympics Rankles Some Athletes
value.excerpt: Several people who were on a conference call with Olympic organizers said later that there was confusion and dismay over whether and how the Games would proceed during a pandemic.
